member.name: T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.CloudConfigurationManager
member.summary: Configuration manager for accessing Windows Azure settings.

member.name: M:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.CloudConfigurationManager.GetSetting(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a setting with the given name.
member.returns: Setting value or null if not found.

member.name: T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Resources.ErrorArgumentEmptyString
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Argument "{0}" cannot be an empty string..

member.name: M:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.AzureApplicationSettings.IsMissingSettingException(System.Exception)
member.summary: Checks whether the given exception represents an exception throws for a missing setting.
member.returns: True for the missing setting exception.

member.name: M:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.AzureApplicationSettings.GetSetting(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a setting with the given name.
member.returns: Setting value or null if such setting does not exist.

member.name: M:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.AzureApplicationSettings.GetValue(System.String,System.String,System.Func{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Gets setting's value from the given provider.
member.returns: Setting value, or null if not found.

member.name: M:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.AzureApplicationSettings.GetServiceRuntimeSetting(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a configuration setting from the service runtime.
member.returns: Setting value or null if not found.

member.name: M:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.AzureApplicationSettings.GetServiceRuntimeAssembly
member.summary: Loads and returns the latest available version of the service runtime assembly.

member.name: M:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.NativeMethods.GetAssemblyPath(System.String)
member.summary: Gets an assembly path from the GAC given a partial name.
member.param: An assembly partial name. May not be null.
member.returns: The assembly path if found; otherwise null;
